Package be.brahms.rent_serve.controllers

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
be.brahms.rent_serve.controllers.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/user/") public class UserController extends Object
This controller manages users Display the profile user Update the profile from user Delete the account by id List of roles Change only password

  • Constructor Details

    • UserController

      public UserController(UserService userService, UserAssembler userAssembler)
      This is the constructor for UserController.
      Parameters:
      userService - This is the service to manage users.
      userAssembler - This helps to change user data to link.

  • Method Details

    • getUsers

      @GetMapping("list") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'MEMBER\')") public ResponseEntity<List<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<UserDto>>> getUsers()
      Get all users from the database.

      This method returns a list of all users. Each user is converted to a UserDto (Data Transfer Object). Each UserDto is wrapped inside an EntityModel with HATEOAS links.

      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a list of user models

    • getUser

      @GetMapping("{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'MEMBER\')") public ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<UserDto>> getUser(@PathVariable long id)
      This method gets a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user we want to find.
      Returns:
      A response with the user data and link.

    • getUsersByRole

      @GetMapping("list/{role}") public ResponseEntity<List<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<UserRoleDto>>> getUsersByRole(@PathVariable Role role)
      Get a list of users by their role.
      Parameters:
      role - the role to find users
      Returns:
      response with a list of user models

    • getUserEdit

      @PutMapping("{id}/edit") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'MEMBER\')") public ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<UserDto>> getUserEdit(@PathVariable long id, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid UserUpdateForm form)
      Update the user with the given ID.

      This method allows a user with role MEMBER to update their own account. It checks if the user making the request is the same as the user in the form.

      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to update
      form - the new data to update the user (must be valid)
      Returns:
      a response with the updated user if successful, or a bad request response if the user is not allowed

    • getUpdatePassword

      @PatchMapping("{id}/change-password") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'MEMBER\')") public ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<UserDto>> getUpdatePassword(@PathVariable long id, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid UserUpdatePasswordForm form)
      Change only the password Check if the user know his email before to change the password Check the password if it's the same, after that it save
      Parameters:
      id - the user's data
      form - the form to update the password only
      Returns:
      the link to update only password

    • deleteUser

      @DeleteMapping("{id}/delete") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'MEMBER\')") public ResponseEntity<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<UserDto>> deleteUser(@PathVariable long id)
      Delete the user. But change the boolean not data From true to false
      Parameters:
      id - the user's ID
      Returns:
      the delete the user with links
